lead_paragraph: Four public officials, objecting to a Times article, say $1 billion in state assistance has transformed the city.

headline.print_headline: The View From Buffalo: The Queen City Is Back!
headline.main: The View From Buffalo: The Queen City Is Back!

snippet: Four public officials, objecting to a Times article, say $1 billion in state assistance has transformed the city.
abstract: Letter from Buffalo Mayor Byron Brown, Rep Brian Higgins, Erie County executive Mark Poloncarz, and Empire State Development Corporation president and chief executive Howard Zemsky responds to May 25 front page article on New York State's controversial $1 billion investment in city of Buffalo.
